name: Monkey See Monkey Do (Mr.ToadFrog)
description:
For some reason you thought it was a good idea to go to the monkey dance club but now you need to use the bathroom.

Get to the club bathroom without the monkeys blocking your way as they copy what you do.

Move with WASD or Arrow keys, press R to restart the level, and press escape to return to main menu.

Made for GMTK game jam, theme Joined Together

Theme Fit: Your movement is joined to the monkeys movement (when you move the monkeys move the same way). You and the monkeys move together, using walls and buttons you can break the join.

Game: Made it Godot

Art: Self made in Asprite

Music: Self Made in OneBitDragon

Audio: Made in Audacity
